description_for_model: A retrieval API for querying and filtering SEC filing documents and Earnings Call Transcripts as well as historical actuals including financials, analyst estimates, revenue segment breakdown, candlestick data, stock quotes, insider transactions and dividends based on natural language queries and metadata.
description_for_human: Retrieve USA stock insights from SEC filings, Transcripts and financial data including historical financial statements, analyst estimates, revenue segment breakdown, candlestick data, stock quotes, insider transactions and dividends.
